scripts.dev: yarn run clean && yarn run compile && concurrently --kill-others "docker-compose up" "yarn workspace @period-tracker-app/mobile compile -w" "yarn workspace @period-tracker-app/mobile start"
scripts.dev:mobile: yarn run clean && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace @period-tracker-app/mobile compile -w" "yarn workspace @period-tracker-app/mobile start"
scripts.prod:web: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up
scripts.test:all: yarn run test:saga && yarn run test:prediction-engine
scripts.reverse:all-ports: adb reverse tcp:3000 tcp:3000 && adb reverse tcp:5000 tcp:5000 && adb reverse tcp:8000 tcp:8000 && adb reverse tcp:8080 tcp:8080 && adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081
scripts.postinstall: test -n "$NOYARNPOSTINSTALL" || (patch-package && jetifier && sed -e 's:node ./node_modules/react-native/cli.js config:yarn run --silent react-native config:g' -i.bak node_modules/@react-native-community/cli-platform-android/native_modules.gradle)
